forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 52F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 46F. NE winds shifting to SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 63F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
